ayage darshana widyawa saha tharaka widyawa pilibada chinthanaya nisa ayaaleksandriyawe, nawa pletonikawadaya pilibada pasale pradhaniwariya wuwaya.[8][9][10][11] ekala sammathayan wenaskirima nisa kupitha wu aleksandriyawe sayirilhi mithya labdhika, parabalani nikaye kristhiyani pradhanin, orestas, saha bishopwaraya pramukha sanhara janayan wisin hayipeshiyata dosharopanaya kota ayawa milechcha lesa ghathanaya karana ladi.[12][13]

eya lokaye mulu janagahanayen biliyana hatharakata aasanna sankhyawak we.eya mulu loka janagahanayen siyayata hatakata aasanna we. 2002 warshaye sita mema aayathanaye salakiya yuthu wyapthawimak sidu wi athi athara, ehi samajikathwaya da dahaatak sita thisthunak dakwa wadi wi atha. 2012 warshaye di kuwet rajyayeda pawath wu samuluwen mema apekshawan kriyathmakawa athi bawa pahadili we.mema sanwidhanayata aasiyanu ratawal siyallama pahe ayath we.
